channel.title: Webclient connection error
channel.description:
My webclient loads correctly, but when you try and login on my server using the webclient, it connects to the local host and not my server's ip.
How do I this?
Thanks

item.title: Webclient connection error
item.dc:creator: @thomas27 thomas27
item.description:
@thomas27 wrote:

First change the ip in your gui (egui).java.
Then look in client.java for server.
You’ll see something like this:
server = “”;
and
setserver("", “43594”);

Change the quotes you your ip and compile and jar your client again

Read full topic
